phrases: Have you found the ancient letters?
I am not having any luck at all...
We are going off to capture some gold-stealing bandits.
Do not tell me it is the Jiggle Butt Gang again?
I do not know, but we will find out along the way.
Sorry, I am going to take a pass this time.
We have not gotten any farther with deciphering the writing
that appeared on the iron rod...
It looks like he went out somewhere.
The two of us will go.
By the two of us, you mean just you and me, Erza?
Do you have a problem with that?
If everything goes smoothly, we should be home by this evening.
Let us get a move on.
In the first place, why did not you invite Juvia?
Our lunch is on the line here, so take it more seriously!
I have got a little bone to pick with the members of Fairy Tail...
You are one of them, are not you?
Then I will flatten you like a pancake!
I was wondering where he went off to,
but it looks like he is been livin' around here!
But Laxus is still in exile.
I am going to check it out!
You want to have a go?!
Cut it out, both of you!
The idea was to check out the source of that lightning, right?
Yeah, and if it is Laxus, I am going to have a showdown with him!
You would not be able to beat Laxus yet!
I totally pitched in and even then, look what happened.
I did not need your help then!
Next time, I am going to win for sure!
No, I am going to win!
That is enough out of you two.
Stop carrying on like little kids.
Laxus, you are livin' around here?
The place I moved to just happens to be near here.
Then you oughta come back to the guild.
I do not give a crap if you come back or not.
But since you are here, let us settle once and for all who is stronger!
You want to piss me off so I will battle you, but I am not going to bite.
You are not the kind of guy that backs down when someone picks a fight, are you...
What are you trying to pull, Natsu?
Laxus does not have to fight.
Our fate is joined with Laxus!
My own fists will pound some sense into their thick skulls.
I think something like this should be carried out with a plan!
I do not know what you mean, but fine.
Let us have it at the Sola tree in the South Gate Park!
And you fight me after that.
Those two never learn their lesson...
I guess Laxus has been living in a corner of Magnolia.
But are Natsu and Gajeel going to be okay?
Well, I do not think there is any way you can have a safe battle with Laxus...
When he was part of the guild,
he was probably only second to Gildarts when it came to strength.
As Master here, it is my duty to liven this up!
It is a rare occasion, so let us have fun with it!
There is a festival going on?!
Looks like everyone is having a good time!
You are the because of this!
There are so many food stands!
You have really got an appetite tonight...
We heard the news about your duel...
They said it is a festival to get pumped up about the main event tomorrow.
It is really because everyone here loves a good festival.
Well, we have not been getting anywhere with those ancient letters,
so this is a perfect way for us to let off some steam, too...
That over there looks delicious, too!
Your reporter Jason here, from Weekly Sorcerer!
And a festival to celebrate a duel!
I have been waiting for this day to come!
Just get the show on the road!
Alright, alright, let me introduce the guest you have all been waiting for...
You are going to get some rock tonight.
That is what I had in mind, anyway, but I have got a sore throat...
Natsu, should not you do something to get ready for tomorrow's fight?
All I got to do is pound the hell outta him with the power I have got.
So you have not put any thought into it at all...
Come to think of it, I wonder what Gajeel's up to...
so he is probably off doing some special training somewhere.
And so, I would like to introduce a soulful singer in my stead!
Thanks for comin' here tonight on my behalf.
We did not come for you!
Well, since you demanded it, I am going to favor you with an original song!
Listen up now, to... Best Friend!
Tremble with love, steel grey metallic!
A guitar and a white suit just does not go with Gajeel...
And his song is weird, too...
I was out on my first job with Shadow Gear for a long time.
Actually, there are some characters I would like you to figure out, Levy-chan!
Guess we will camp out here for the night...
Even though I thought we would have this wrapped up while it was still light out...
At least we know where their hideout is.
All we have to do now is wait'til they come back with the gold.
It is like we have got nothing to say to each other...
Are not you going to strip?
You can sleep better in the buff, yes?
Yeah, well, it depends on my mood...
I mean, look at you, still wearing your armor...
Telling him right out, To bed?!
Oh, if only he said it like that to Juvia...
Juvia, let us go to bed.
This is no time to be imagining that!
Jeez, does not she have even an ounce of caution?
She is got a pretty face when she is quiet like this...
I am Erza Scarlet of Fairy Tail!
I do not think there is any need to introduce ourselves to these bums.
We are here by request of the owner of that gold you stole.
We thought something like this could happen,
so we hired a couple bodyguards!
If you want a big chunk of the loot, do a good job, gentlemen!
We are the notorious Vanish Brothers!
Vanish Brothers... I have heard of you.
If I recall, you are the guys Natsu beat the hell out of
That was a long time ago.
Since then, we have had so much training that we are powerful enough
to face even Erza of Fairy Tail without fear.
Yes, show us how powerful a mercenary guild is.
No, I am going to handle these two alone.
Natsu beat you by himself, did not he?
Brother, this guy is making light of us.
Think of this as business only.
Anyway, all we have to do is beat him to a pulp, right?
My Frying Pan has always been able to absorb fire attacks...
It also doubles the power it catches, converts it, and spurts it back out!
That is not going to touch me!
Bro, let us go with the you-know-what!
Finishing Move: Destruction of Heaven and Earth!
Natsu defeated them before, but have they improved these past seven years?
If you are comin' at me from the heavens and earth,
I have got something for you both!
I guess Gray's also gotten better...
These guys should not have given you that much trouble.
I wanted to have a little fun with it.
We are going to return the gold you stole to its rightful owner.
You have no complaints, do you?
Now Juvia can go home with peace of mind.
What is all this hullabaloo about?
Not every day you have a showdown, Laxus,
so everyone is been making a big to-do about it since last night.
They are probably happy about getting the chance to see you again after so long.
You know that more than anyone, Laxus!
I am not too sure about that...
Would you buy this for me?!
I told them to have the fight today to give them time to cool off...
Not expecting it would become a major event, huh?
Yes, this is not what I had in mind at all!
We were looking for you all over!
Natsu-san and Gajeel-san are going to have a duel with Laxus-san!
We have Laxus waiting patiently, as dignified as you would expect!
The combatants glare at each other!
There is tension in the air...
All the pieces are in place!
Apparently, he is heading for Natsu first!
I do not have to hold back at all, do I?
Not going to be my fault if you snuff it.
The same goes for you, Laxus!
Whoever makes the first move will lose...
Done with a single blow, huh?
I figured this would happen, Laxus!
This is what you call a difference in skill level.
Do not tell me that bastard has run off!
No way are we going to let him escape!
Combing the hills is a Man!
I have lost respect for you!
I have never heard of that.
So what is it say, Levy-chan?
Time is etched and then chaos descends.
I have heard that phrase before somewhere...
It is about time you lifted Laxus's expulsion!
The phrase time is etched and then chaos descends appears in this book.
It is a story about a clock that follows a strange destiny
through the ages as it is passed on from one person to another.
This is not just some rod...
It is the hand of a clock!
Where did that bastard Gajeel hide?!
Macao and the others are searching, but they may not be able to find him.
Who the hell's come to pick a fight with Fairy Tail?!
Feels like I have seen them somewhere before...
Jeez, Natsu, you have got bad eyes!
Now that you mention it, they do seem kind of different...
Your eyes are bad too, Happy!
It looks like they are after Lucy!
She is probably behind on her rent or something!
